personalInfo.name: Rakesh Krishnamoorthy
personalInfo.title: DevOps Engineer
personalInfo.bio: I am a passionate DevOps engineer with expertise in building and managing scalable, reliable, and secure infrastructure. I specialize in automating workflows, optimizing CI/CD pipelines, and ensuring seamless collaboration between development and operations teams.

projects.title: GPT genius
projects.description: Your AI Language companion. Powered by openAI , It enhances your Conversation , content creation and more !

projects.title: JobsEzy
projects.description: A application for seeking Tech Jobs where you can find the most suitable job for your skills.

keyResponsibilities: Contributed to the development of HireSRE AI, an AI-based server monitoring application, working on both Next.js (frontend) and Python (backend).
Supported AWS Bootcamp activities, gaining hands-on experience in deploying and managing services.
Assisted in integrating monitoring tools to track server performance and generate actionable insights.
Actively contributed to team discussions, bringing fresh ideas to improve automation and system reliability .
Participated in troubleshooting and resolving deployment and infrastructure issues.

education.description: Completed a comprehensive curriculum in computer science engineering, including courses in data structures, algorithms, software engineering, and artificial intelligence. Worked on several projects.
